Modals

Small

Cats have been groomed

Due to inactivity your cats became matted and needed grooming. Don’t worry, we took care of that for you. You can find your newly groomed cat’s in the “My Profile” section of the application enjoying their fresh new look!

Okay
HTML
<button class="trigger1 button primary small">Click here to trigger the Small modal!</button>
<div class="modal" id="m1">
	<div class="modal-content modal-small">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<h1>Cats have been groomed</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="modal-body">
			<p>Due to inactivity your cats became matted and needed grooming. Don’t worry, we took care of that for you. You can find your newly groomed cat’s in the “My Profile” section of the application enjoying their fresh new look! </p>
		</div>
		<div class="modal-button">
			<a class="close-button c1 button-minimal">Okay</a>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>


<script>
	/* Small Modal */
	var modal1 = document.querySelector("#m1");
	var trigger1 = document.querySelector(".trigger1");
	var closeButton = document.querySelector(".c1");

	function toggleModal() {
		modal1.classList.toggle("show-modal");
	}

	function windowOnClick(event) {
		if (event.target === modal1) {
			toggleModal();
		}
	}

	trigger1.addEventListener("click", toggleModal);
	closeButton.addEventListener("click", toggleModal);
</script>

Medium

Cats have been groomed

Due to inactivity your cats became matted and needed grooming. Don’t worry, we took care of that for you. You can find your newly groomed cat’s in the “My Profile” section of the application enjoying their fresh new look!

Cancel
Next
HTML
<button class="trigger2 button primary small">Click here to trigger the Medium modal!</button>
<div class="modal" id="m2">
	<div class="modal-content modal-medium">
		<div class="modal-header">
			<h1>Cats have been groomed</h1>
		</div>
		<div class="modal-body">
			<p>Due to inactivity your cats became matted and needed grooming. Don’t worry, we took care of that for you. You can find your newly groomed cat’s in the “My Profile” section of the application enjoying their fresh new look! </p>
		</div>
		<div class="modal-buttons">
			<div class="modal-buttons-left">
				<a class="c2 button-minimal">Cancel</a>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-buttons-center">
				<div class="pipe"></div>
			</div>
			<div class="modal-buttons-right">
				<a class="button-minimal">Next</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>


<script>
	/* Medium Modal */
	var modal2 = document.querySelector("#m2");
	var trigger2 = document.querySelector(".trigger2");
	var closeButton2 = document.querySelector(".c2");

	function toggleModal2() {
		modal2.classList.toggle("show-modal");
	}

	function windowOnClick(event) {
		if (event.target === modal2) {
			toggleModal2();
		}
	}

	trigger2.addEventListener("click", toggleModal2);
	closeButton2.addEventListener("click", toggleModal2);
</script>

<div class="modal" id="m3">

			</div>
			<div class="modal-buttons-right">
				<a class="button-minimal">Next</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>

<script>
	/* Large Modal */
	var modal3 = document.querySelector("#m3");
	var trigger3 = document.querySelector(".trigger3");
	var closeButton3 = document.querySelector(".c3");

	function toggleModal3() {
		modal3.classList.toggle("show-modal");
	}

	function windowOnClick(event) {
		if (event.target === modal3) {
			toggleModal3();
		}
	}

	trigger3.addEventListener("click", toggleModal3);
	closeButton3.addEventListener("click", toggleModal3);
</script>
